title: returnAcknowldegement
description: This schema is used for acknowledgement of a Return notification

return_authorization_id.description: Jet.com unique ID for the return

merchant_order_id.description: Jet's unique ID for a given merchant order

new_id.description: Optional Merchant supplied order ID that should have been established in OrderAcknowledgement in order to use in this message

return_date.description: The date that the customer requested a return authorization

return_status.description:
The seller acknowledges the receipt of the ReturnNotification or Communicates to Jet that a refund can be passed without needing to have the customer actually send the item back.

			This must be sent back to Jet immediately so any desire to not have the customer actually sent back must be made based on some automatic logic

			#Valid values

			*'acknowledged'
			*'refund customer without return'

merchant_ra.description: Optional Merchant supplied ID.  Jet will map this ID to the 'return_authorization_id' and this ID will be included on the Return Documentation that Jet gives to the customer
